data.prayer: Father, move the 79,556 believers in the county of Ezhou to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ezhou, Hubei, China
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 79,556 believers in Ezhou to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Ezhou.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Ezhou, Hubei, China to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Lord we ask you on behalf of the Miao, Enshi people. 0.1% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Ezhou, Hubei, China.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 79,556 believers in the county of Ezhou the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.

data.section_summary:
the county of Ezhou, Hubei, China has a population of 1,048,700.

We estimate Ezhou has 79,556 people who might know Jesus, 16,942 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 952,203 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Ezhou access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”
